system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.3pqYEYpiST7GlBFV]{Shield Focus}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.SJ40tT28alLWvOze]{Shield Strike}

Benefits

When using a shield improve the cover granted by the shield by one step.
system.summary: Cover from shield increases one step
